abstract: FleetCor, based in Georgia, said it was impressed with how its acquisition, Serviços e Tecnologia de Pagamentos, has fared during Brazil’s downturn.
snippet: FleetCor, based in Georgia, said it was impressed with how its acquisition, Serviços e Tecnologia de Pagamentos, has fared during Brazil’s downturn.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — FleetCor Technologies has agreed to acquire the Brazilian electronic toll payments company Serviços e Tecnologia de Pagamentos for $1.05 billion.

headline.main: FleetCor Technologies in Deal for Brazilian Toll Payments Company

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Servicos e Tecnologia de Pagamentos SA
